verbs.description: social media rants [V: hate] [ARG1: speech] by would - be shooters create dilemma for police their anger is all over social media for the whole world to see with rants about minorities relationships gone bad or paranoid delusions about perceived slights south carolina robert bowers police department twitter american type founders associated press hate speech bureau of alcohol police parkland new jersey arlington erich pratt pittsburgh synagogue dylann roof florida high school texas david chipman bower social media pittsburgh gun owners of america executive director lt chris cook atf giffords center dylan jarrell nikolas cruz florida kentucky lt chris cook international association of chiefs of police facebook
